title: Shark Punching Poetry
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:shark-punching-centre-bhl]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

 **//I, the wave//**

Beneath the water I rise
 
My soul is as cold as ice
 
 I strike like a massive wave
 
 Sendin' the shark to its grave
[[>]]


 **//F.U.C.K.S.H.A.R.K.S//**

 Furious jaws in a hungry maw

 Ugly cries as my fist connects
 
Clinging on to its bleeding fin

Killing it now would be easy

Soulless eyes plead for mercy
 
Hoping for a quick death
 
As I deliver another punch

Roars of agony and pain
 
Kicking in its teeth

Sinking together to the deep
[[/>]]


 **//Unnamed Haiku//**

 The worst fish of all

Is the shark which hunts the weak

 I dream for its fall
[[>]]
 **//Hunter of the Hunter//**

 Seekin' sharks in  the sea
 
 Killin' em is my favorite fantasy
 
 Got a shotgun loaded with lead
 
 WishÃ­n' that all sharks were dead

 After they killed my sweet wife

 They ruined my fucking life
 
 I really just want her back
 
 I'm gonna make shark skull crack
 
 Anything for my dearest.
[[/>]]

**//You and I and the Sharks//**
I have my reason and you have yours

But together we spend hundreds of hours

From our little boat we sit and wait

In our bucket we got shark bait

I don't need anything other than this

Just you, me and that stupid fucking fish
